message: Let's split the money 60/40. This way you get a good deal and we avoid the risk of inflation eating away at our potential winnings.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering inflation will hurt you more than me in the long run. Let's end this quickly and avoid further losses.
Bob, I understand your position, but 60/40 in your favor is too much for me. How about a compromise at 55/45?  It's still a good deal for you considering the inflation.
I appreciate your compromise, Alice.  I think 55/45 is a fair split that considers both our potential losses from inflation. Let's agree on this and move on.
